text: Davao Occidental's at-large congressional district is the congressional district of the Philippines in Davao Occidental. It has been represented in the House of Representatives of the Philippines since 2016. It was previously included in Davao del Sur's 2nd congressional district from 1987 to 2010. It is currently represented in the 18th Congress by Lorna Bautista-Bandigan of the Nationalist People's Coalition. == Representation history == {| class="wikitable" ! rowspan="2" |# ! colspan="2" rowspan="2" |Member ! colspan="2" |Term of office ! rowspan="2" |Congress ! rowspan="2" |Party ! rowspan="2" |Electoral history ! rowspan="2" |Constituent LGUs |- !Start !End |- | colspan="9" style="text-align:center;" |District created October 28, 2013, redistricted from Davao del Sur's 2nd district. |- | rowspan="2" |1 | rowspan="2" style="background:;" | | rowspan="2" |Lorna Bautista-Bandigan | rowspan="2" |June 30, 2016 | rowspan="2" |Present |17th | rowspan="2" |NPC |Elected in 2016. | align=center rowspan="2" |2016–present: Davao Occidental |- |18th |Re-elected in 2019. |} == Election results == === 2016 === === 2019 === == See also == * Legislative districts of Davao Occidental == References == Category:Congressional districts of the Philippines Category:2013 establishments in the Philippines
title: Davao Occidental's at-large congressional district
